structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIII(R). MODEL CITY URBAN CENTER DISTRICT (MCUCD)

law.catch_line: Model City Urban Center District (MCUCD) requirements.

text.section:
Sec. 33-284.99.41. Model City Urban Center District (MCUCD) requirements.
Except as provided herein, all developments within the MCUCD shall comply with the requirements provided in Article XXXIII(K), Standard Urban Center District Regulations, of this code.
